comment.body: You trying to use tor on the web, or zeronet over tor?
You don't have to set tor proxy on firefox for enabling it in zeronet, what you need is Tor Always Mode, set it up in http://127.0.0.1:43110/Config
Is tor status ok in ZeroHello?
Then you have an issue there with Tor, click the Tor button at ZeroHello, does it decribe the error a bit better? like, is it related to the control port or what does it reference?

Yeah, just checked. That means tor is not running. If you are on linux you could run `pgrep tor -fa` to check if it's running (probably isn't). You must start tor, btw, if it wasn't working when trying in on firefox then there's the cause as well.
I particularly lack such amounts of storage space, so I mostly seed small things like some images or pdf documents.

I wouldn't recommend using a usb drive for anything for brief backups, I've never liked the idea of portable usb drives it feels too fragile. Instead, I'd recommend disassembling that disk enclosure and interfacing it with sata instead, it's going to faster, that's for sure.
There's [name.yo](/1NAMEz7stUPZErkV1d3yLkVWQFa4PTqDNv) site which serves as a centralized DNS like service in zeronet.
though it amuses many, it also damages the image of young girls worldwide (on that note, I think males shouldn't wander shirtless on public...)
Yeah, maybe all fit guys love it but I don't like it, also, it isn't fair game to woman since they can't roam about as freely without social consequences...
